original: 'jam dpal nag po thugs kyi yang zhun gyi bla ma brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs bzhugs so //
analyzed: jam dpal nag po thugs kyi yang zhun gyi bla ma brgyud ba gsol debs bzhugs so

original: om ahhu~m/ kun bzang 'jam dpal pad+ma thod phreng rtshal //
analyzed: om kun bzang jam dpal pad+ma thod phreng rtshal

original: mnga' bdag yab sras ye shes mtshho rgyal ma //
analyzed: mnga bdag yab sras ye shes mtshho rgyal ma

original: zab gter mnga' bdag o rgyan sangs rgyas gling //
analyzed: zab gter mnga bdag o rgyan sangs rgya gling

original: rang sras bdun rgyud   ye shes rdo rje /
analyzed: rang sras bdun brgyud ye shes rdo rje

original: sangs rgyas blo gros /
analyzed: sangs rgya blo gros

original: bsod nams lhun grub /
analyzed: bsod nams lhun grub

original: chos kyi rgyal mtshhan /
analyzed: chos kyi rgyal mtshhan

original: karma bzang po /
analyzed: karma bzang po

original: karma sngags 'chang /
analyzed: karma sngags chang

original: rig 'dzin snying po'i bar   bde chen dar rgyas dang / bka' drin mtshhungs med bde chen rab gsal zhabs //
analyzed: rig dzin snying po ba bde chen dar rgya dang bka drin mtshhungs med bde chen rab gsal zhabs

original: rtsha ba'i bla ma dran chog 'khor lo'i mgon //
analyzed: rtsha ba bla ma dran chog khor lo mgon

original: 'jam dpal yang zhun smin grol brgyud pa yi //
analyzed: jam dpal yang zhun smin grol brgyud ba yi

original: bla ma rnams dang yi dam lhag pa'i lhar //
analyzed: bla ma rnams dang yi dam lhag ba lhar

original: rtshe gcig gsol ba btab pa'i mthu stobs kyis //
analyzed: rtshe gcig gsol ba debs ba mthu stobs kyis

original: las bzhi lhun grub grub pa che brgyad thob /
analyzed: las bzhi lhun grub grub ba che brgyad thob

original: khyad par tshhe dbang phyag rgya che mchog grub //
analyzed: khyad ba tshhe dbang phyag rgya che mchog grub

original: 'jam dpal go 'phang tshhe 'dir thob byin rlobs //
analyzed: jam dpal go phen tshhe dir thob byin rlobs

original: zhes 'jam dpal nag po thugs kyi yang zhun gyi bla ma brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs 'di yang rig pa 'dzin pa tshhe dbang nor bus sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: zhes jam dpal nag po thugs kyi yang zhun gyi bla ma brgyud ba gsol debs di yang rig ba dzin ba tshhe dbang nor bud sbyor ba

original: sarba mang+ga lam/// /
